author: markbrus88
title: Barcelona confident Lionel Messi and Andres Iniesta will sign new contracts
text:
Lionel Messi and Andres Iniesta are taking their time over signing new deals (Picture: Getty) Barcelona sporting director Robert Fernandez is confident of keeping hold of star duo Lionel Messi and Andres Iniesta as they head towards the final year of their contracts.
Time for a reality check: Arsenal is as good as it's going to get for Mesut Ozil The Catalan giants have appeared to struggle to tie down two of their most important players, with Messi a particular worry as his deal is set to expire at the end of next season.
The Argentine forward is regarded as one of the best players in the world and perhaps among the finest of all time, and has been linked with a move to Manchester City amid doubts over his future at the Nou Camp.
Messi and Iniesta are hugely important to this Barca side (Picture: Getty) The pair are among the club’s most successful academy products ever (Picture: Getty) Still, Fernandez is not worried and expects both players to sign as they are happy with the club.
‘Messi will renew, I have always said that,’ Fernandez told Cadena SER .
‘Leo is happy in Barcelona, really happy here, and in a magnificent team. I have no doubts that he will renew.

‘Iniesta will, too. He will renew at the moment he chooses. Andres deserves the best. He grew here as a player and he’s given everything for the club.
‘He’s special in every sense, a person that’s well-loved. I can’t imagine a Barcelona without him and he can’t either.’
